articles.title: Jane Fonda to be honored with the Cecil B. deMille Award at 2021 Golden Globes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 83-year-old American actress will be taking the stage at The Beverly Hilton to accept the honor equivalent to the lifetime achievement award at one of Hollywood's biggest nights on February 28.
articles.content:
Jane Fonda will receive the Cecil B. deMille Award at 2021 Golden Globes next month.
